attributes.action: Include cats in the list of animals you have to report if in a car accident
attributes.additional_details:
Change the Road Traffic Act 1988 Part VII Section 170, 1Bii to include cats.
Sign this petition in an attempt to change the law.
attributes.background:
The current Road Traffic Act 1988, states that's only the following animals are to be reported if involved in an accident; horse, cattle, ass, mule, sheep, pig, goat or dog. 
Like these animals, the majority of cats also have owners who would deserve to know if their pet was involved in an accident
